Title: 21 Emon
Description: ["In 2018 a young boy named 21 Emon dreams of becoming a space pilot and exploring space in general. He is the heir to a long line of hotel owners, which dates back to the founder of during the Tokugawa shogunate. Since the Earth has become a planet visited by tourists from all over the space, 21 Emon has to help out his family's business or they'll go bankrupt."]
Staff: [['Hara, Keiichi', 'Director'], ['Sadamitsu, Shinya', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Shigino, Akira', 'Storyboard'], ['Makaino, Kouji', 'Theme Song Composition']]
